title: DORMOBILE 68 interior for an RHD split or bay for sale with great buddy seats

posts.content:
FOR SALE…. 1968 original complete Dormobile interior – ready to go straight into a RHD walkthrough split or would suit an RHD early bay
Visit viewtopic.php?f=4&t=117853

AND

Also selling on a separate post or combined as one sale:

2 x Dormobile Buddy seats:
A pair of partially retrimmed, restuffed, and resprung GENUINE Dormobile buddy seats. The best you will find. Please see viewtopic.php?f=4&t=117854

It is sadly time to put our lovely dormy interior and pair of reupholstered buddy seats up for sale. Not quite period for our bus but we had a blank canvas and it all worked beautifully for sleeping, storage and roominess in our RHD split. Take a look here>> viewtopic.php?f=4&t=117853 and viewtopic.php?f=4&t=117854

For more details and picture requests please contact Carlos on 07711 626260 or email carl@viewfromthebridge.net

See our build thread:
viewtopic.php?f=4&t=117853
